patthana16.20:4.1: Kusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:4.2: Kusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:4.3: Kusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:5.1: Akusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:5.2: Akusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.20:5.3: Akusalaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca naabyākato nacittasamuṭṭhāno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:6.1: Abyākataṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:7.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
patthana16.20:8.1: Kusalaṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.20:9.1: Akusalaṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.20:10.1: Abyākataṃ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.20:11.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
